report.title: Locations for my sites.
report.description: Returns the list of sites that falls into a parent boundary, where the location is not already one of 'my sites'.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=l.location_type_id LEFT JOIN (person_attribute_values pav JOIN users u on u.person_id=pav.person_id AND u.id=#user_id# ) ON pav.person_attribute_id=#person_site_attr_id# AND pav.int_value=l.id AND pav.deleted=false #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND ('#location_type_ids#'='0' OR l.location_type_id IN (#location_type_ids#)) AND (#hide_existing#=0 OR (u.id IS NULL AND l.created_by_id<>#user_id#)) #order_by#

param.name: location_type_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of location_type_ids to allow for inclusion in the results.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: parent_id
param.description: The ID of the parent location to filter for
param.join: JOIN locations lp on lp.id=#parent_id# and st_intersects(lp.boundary_geom, coalesce(l.boundary_geom, l.centroid_geom))

param.name: person_site_attr_id
param.description: The person attribute ID used to store My Sites

param.name: hide_existing
param.display: Should sites already in My Sites be hidden?
